item.description:
Reposting from Facebook: https://www.facebook....

You must purchase a ticket to attend! Tickets & details at: http://altorgs.ticket...

Note that the first bar is the Sunset Grill in Allston and we will be all over Boston and Cambridge from there, traveling from place to place via party bus. However, to help local drivers get on the pub tour, the bus will be picking/drop off at 82 Bishop Richard Allen Dr. in the parking lot behind the Harvest Co-op in Central Square Cambridge at about 530p and will leave at 6p. Then after the night is over it will drop off there. There is lots of free parking in the area and the meters go off after 6p. If you live in the 'burbs you can also park at Alewife T station and take the red line to Central Square. The bus pickup in Central Square will leave promptly at 6p so please be on time.

LOCATION OF CENTRAL SQUARE PICKUP/DROPOFF & NEARBY PARKING http://postimage.org/...

If you have any problem finding the group, call or text Andreas at 617-398-7402.

group.name: The Boston Area Libertarian Meetup Group

item.name: Liberty Drinks AltOrgs Boston Pub Tour 2 join NH folks in Boston Crawl!
